text:
[Verse]
Laughing in the storm
We splash and we run
Shoes left far behind
Kissing in the sun

[Verse 2]
Raindrops on our hair
No worries at all
Spinning all around
We answer the call

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
No care for the day
Jumping in the puddles
Making time just play

[Verse 3]
Under cloudy skies
Our hearts feel the beat
We don't need no roof
Twirling in the street

[Bridge]
Midnight's closing in
Moonlight starts to peek
We embrace the night
No words left to speak

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
No care for the day
Jumping in the puddles
Making time just play
title: Dancing in the Rain
